name: 1911/12 Grain Elevators in Western Canada
description: The file contained in this study is composed of .csv files related to a series of xsl transformation performed on OCR scans of the 1911/12 List of licensed elevators and warehouses in the Manitoba Grain Inspection Division to generate the .csv from file. The code utilized in the xsl transformation can be found on GitHub.

distribution.name: Grain_Elevators_AB_SK_MB_1911.zip
distribution.description: This .csv file contains data related to grain elevators in 1911/12
